378827494105215493.Text: Well, of course. It's just a translation from the Argonian. That would translate to something like Hajeekius, Hajesheeus, maybe Haj-Ei. Literal translations can get a little awkward sometimes. Most folks don't bother to learn the language of these savages; they find it too hard to pronounce. For me, though, it makes business a little bit easier.
